name: Danmakufu Script
summary: Learn about .DNH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Danmakufu scripts also use the .TXT file extension.

description: Game script used by Touhou Danmakufu, a Japanese vertical scrolling shooter game that uses special attack patterns in the forms of circles, spirals, and other shapes; defines behaviors for the game in a plain text script format; can be modified with a text editor to create custom game content.
